posts.post_content:
I have these 3 T205 cards for sale.  Please PM me if interested

Louis Evans PSA 3 - Sovereign back
Bris Lord PSA 3 - American Beauty back
Germany Schaefer PSA 4 - Piedmont back

Would like $105 delivered on the 3.  Or make me an offer.

Thank you.

posts.post_title: T205 Lot of 3 Psa Graded w/ Schaefer
posts.post_content: Pm sent to you on this nice T205 lot.

posts.post_title: T205 Lot of 3 Psa Graded w/ Schaefer
posts.post_content:
Hi Kevin,
I'll take these... thanks for the message back, and these will be great additions for me.  Just let me know where you send you the funds.
Rick.

posts.post_title: T205 Lot of 3 Psa Graded w/ Schaefer
posts.post_content:
Payment sent for these.  Thanks again Kevin, i'm looking forward to receiving the cards!  I'll PM you my address now...
Rick.

posts.post_title: T205 Lot of 3 Psa Graded w/ Schaefer
posts.post_content:
Hi Kevin,
The T205 lot has safely arrived... I just wanted to thank you again for the great packaging and cards... and to give you well-deserved positive feedback here too!  Thanks again,
Rick.
I am happy they arrived safely...enjoy your collection!
